release.action: The property #referencedTableName of class ForeignKey was not set properly by OracleColumnFinder#getConstraint().
Add DBUnit Support. This is only a prototype implementation and may be change in further releases.
The Loader class in combination with the Data class supports DATE types.
The Loader class has some problems with 0 and NULL.
The Data object rows must not match all columns of a table. It is possible to define a Data object with a subset of defined table columns.
Two new methods: OraUtils#checkValidPackages(...) and OraUtils#checkValidProcedures(...).
Loader and Data scripts for holding/importing table data.
